members.signatureBeforeChange: boolean hitTestSelection (int index, int x, int y)
members.signatureAfterChange: boolean hitTestSelection (int index, int x, int y)
diff: +	 * Return when redraw is false & index is 0, to avoid a possible
+	 * recursion, when user sets ItemHeight during SWT.MeasureItem event
+	 * processing & with a non-zero table-row selection, refer bug 400174.
